body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     News             News                   Khalil Gibran Memorial Garden               Chevy Chase Circle               Meridian Hill Park               Georgetown Waterfront Park             The Fountains of Rock Creek Park Rock Creek Park administers four fountains in Washington D.C. -- at Georgetown Waterfront Park, Meridian Hill Park, Chevy Chase Circle and at the Kahlil Gibran Memorial.  They are turned off during the winter. The Georgetown Waterfront Fountain is now on. The cascading fountain at Meridian Hill Park is will be on in late spring.
